Package client.proxy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IServer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AcceptTrade
    contains information on the action of accepting/rejecting a trade
    BuildCity
    contains information about the action of building a city
    BuildRoad
    contains information about building a road
    BuildSettlement
    contains information about a settlement building action
    BuyDevCard
    Contains information for a buy dev card request
    ChangeLogLevelRequest
    the request for changing a logging level
    Command  
    CreateGameRequest
    Contains the information for creating a new game.
    CredentialRequest
    Holds a username and password for logins and registration
    DiscardCards
    contains information about discarding cards
    FinishMove
    Contains information for a finish turn request
    GameData
    Contains basic game information for the join game screen.
    JoinGameReqeust
    Contains the information necessary for joining a game.
    LoadGameRequest
    Contains the necessary info for loading a game
    MaritimeTrade
    contains information on making a maritime trade
    Monopoly_
    Contains information about playing a monopoly card
    Monument_
    Contains information on playing a monument card
    OfferTrade
    contains information on offering a trade
    Poller
    A Poller class which will occasionally call for an update on the map.
    Request  
    Road_Building_
    Contains the information involved in playing a road building card
    RobPlayer
    Contains the information for a rob request to be made.
    RollNumber
    represents a reqeust to force a particular roll.
    SaveGameRequest
    Contains all the requisite info for saving a game to a file.
    SendChat
    Contains the information for posting a new chat message.
    ServerProxy  
    Soldier_
    contains information on playing a soldier card
    Year_Of_Plenty_
    Contains the information for playing a year of plenty
